website_summaries.verdict: The Cloudride DMX 4 has received positive feedback across the board. The comfort it offers for daily walking and its clean style resonate well with the wearers. Although some seem to feel uncomfortable with the shoe’s raised heel, the majority enjoy the cushioning provided by the DMX
pros: The majority of buyers find this shoe very comfortable for everyday casual wear
Its design is considered to be visually appealing by a good number of users
Many purchasers describe the item as well-constricted and made of quality materials
It feels light and airy on the foot, according to more than a few wearers
The shoe comes at a rather affordable price
cons: A number of people say that the raised heel pushes the foot forward, making it feel like they are walking downhill
Some people lack room in the forefoot, wishing that the trainer came in a wide option

customer_reviews.title: The Unwalkable Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes looked nice and I've had good luck with Reeboks in the past. They fit OK, but when I tried walking I was stunned by how far the bottom juts out behind and to the outside of the foot heel and how high the heel is in relation to the rest. It's like trying to walk in high heels with something large stuck to the back. You end up leaning forward and can't use a normal walk. The images do not sufficiently show how bizarrely unbalanced and clunky this thing is.
customer_reviews.author: PNWConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Great technology
customer_reviews.text: Since they are fabric they feel a little but not too loose, on every shoe I own I'm always inserting insoles since I have flat feet, on this interesting shoe tech, I have not needed insoles, the sole on this shoe has a ball like (rounded) heel support that manages to move along with the joint and it's natural range of motion, it feels very comfortable, light shoe, I can wear it all day and my knees feel fine with less popping sounds, overall I like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These style shoes always feel good on your feet. They are not called cloudride for nothing. It feels like you walking on clouds. I hope they never stop making these shoes. I think they are the best even beating out nike air. If you haven't tried them then I say don't knock it till you try it because trust me I work in these shoes and any other shoes makes my feet hurt for the long hours I am on my feet. But these here!! Man!! And they will last me at least 3 years working 5 days a week!! Not going to lie I will be back buying these anywhere I can find them.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you have a pronation issue
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Reebok shoes because they supported my high arches very nicely. Since the purchase they fit like, well Addidas, which is poorly. I like the look and feel of the shoe, the problem is if I wore these for any length of time I could expect to have serious lower leg and back issues.
customer_reviews.author: Utahute72

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.text: I work at a production, manufacturing plant. On my feet all day. 12 hour shifts. Wanted a more comfortable shoe. Took a chance at these. Got a good price, but they are not comfortable. After a few hours in my feet, I think anything would be more comfortable. I like Reebok, but these are terrible for all day wear while working. May be fine for an average outing or a shorter work day, but I wouldn't know.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Zilic

customer_reviews.title: Heel is a little high
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is a little tight. Ordered 9.5 mens and they are a little tight. Should have got size 10. Heel is a little high, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great walking shoes. I believe they run about a half size small. I wear 9.5, but after reading other reviews, i ordered 10s. Fit perfect. Strange to walk in until you get use to them. The tread is deep, the heel has like a ball. Walking comfort is great.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable to me.
customer_reviews.text: These were the least comfortable shoe I've had on in a long time. The uppers were very stiff and the fancy soles made me feel unstable. I'm above average in weight and yet I couldn't seem to compress these 'cushioning' sections, especially the heel. I'll be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Yale Porter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walking right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walking right out of the box. I do 6-10 miles a day and was able to transition to these without needing a break in period.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Pope

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: For is similar to the last set of Reebok shoes i bought. Great for me. Comfortable so far just walking around the house. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Randomtasks

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoes I ever had and would order another one when this wears out.
customer_reviews.text: I first used this shoes for walking only. I found it very comfortable and my knee do not hurt when I walk 3-4 miles. I now wears it almost every time especially when shopping with my wife. The name cloudride is just so fitting for this shoes. I will get me another one when this one wears out and suggest my wife to have one for herself as well.
customer_reviews.author: DANILO S CONSTANTINO

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and the shoes are very comfortable. The heel takes a little time to get use to.
customer_reviews.author: jja

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i am hesitant to buy clothing and shoes online because of fit problems, but they were perfect. needed a great shoe for walking, and i found it with the cloudride
customer_reviews.author: AHE

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little loose for me but quite comfortable and light. Lol the pattern makes them squeak when you walk
customer_reviews.author: Bryon Margo

customer_reviews.title: Not old guy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great walking shoes without looking like old guy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: SDfam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I both three of this tennis shoes for my son, husband and nephew and they loved, and said how comfortable it was and worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marilucy Boyd

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fit, so he wore it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit snug at first. However, after a good short walk my husband loves them. Reebok never fails.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I work overnight on my feet for 8 hrs it not alot shoe's that make my feet hurt but these shoes feel great
customer_reviews.author: larry threadgill

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great price and vey comfortable shoe. Secind pair from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great Kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy and stylish. Have 3 pair. Get them if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Run a little big
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. They're lightweight and breathable , they do run a little large but it's not a big problem. Insanely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: If they didn't have two uncomfortable balls built into the sole they would be a lot better. Causes pressure points on my feet and I lose feeling while walking. Don't buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe -
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these shoes. I do think the sole treads have started to peel back a little sooner than I expected. I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: Good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Comfortable but Very slippery on floors when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the best shoe I ever brought,I am a size 10 1/2 got 11fit great
customer_reviews.author: tommy norris

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 months old and heel rubbed out. Causing blisters
customer_reviews.text: Reebok cannot be trusted anymore! I normally do 5-7 miles a day in my shoes and the soles on these seemed perfect for my needs. And they held up well so far. But the heel material has completely failed in just over 2 months and is bad enough that it's rubbing blisters on my heels. I go through 4-5 pairs of shoes a year and never had any fail like this. Total trash. Between these and the Crossfit Reeboks (HIIT Tr Cross Trainer) I got in August 2020 ... I can honestly say to serious walkers/runners: avoid Reebok. Under Armour provides better quality than this (and that is saying something).
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, feel nice.
customer_reviews.text: Fit the same as my other Reeboks as far as sizing. I wasn't sure about them at first as they really have cushion and feel different than running type shoes.. after about 5 minutes they felt great and still do after a week of daily wear. I just bought a second pair to put away.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK

customer_reviews.title: DMX Works for my foot problem
customer_reviews.text: I have a foot problem that requires extra cushioning for my foot and DMX provides that cushioning comfort
customer_reviews.author: Kyle webb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! for about  2 weeks...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these when I first got them, after some minor wear ( using just for walks, not everyday use ) and a months time and they collapsed inward! You can see it pronounced in the picture on the left shoe ( I'm wearing them in photo ) Really sucks because they were awesome for a while, I have no choice but to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible hurt my feet and legs. They are the oddest feeling shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Jason moore

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Cloudride DMX 4.0 Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, joseph william Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, j.W. Foster and sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
